      • isColumnUnique

        public static boolean isColumnUnique(java.io.File[] dbfFiles,
                     java.lang.String[] columnNames)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Tests a combined column for uniqueness across several files
        Parameters:
        dbfFiles -
        columnNames -
        Returns:
        A value of true if the columns contain values that uniquely identify rows in all the dbf files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDBFData

                              java.lang.String[] fieldNames)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        dbfFile - A DBF file
        fieldNames - A list of field names to retrieve, or null for all columns
        Returns:

      • storeAttributes

        public static void storeAttributes(java.io.File[] dbfFiles,
                   java.sql.Connection conn,
                   java.lang.String sqlSchema,
                   java.lang.String sqlTable,
                   boolean overwriteTables,
                   java.lang.String[] nullValues)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        dbfFiles - A list of DBF files to merge
        conn - a database connection
        sqlSchema - schema to store table
        sqlTable - table name to store data
        overwriteTables - Set this to true to overwrite an existing SQL table.
        nullValues - A list of Strings to interpret as null values.
        Throws:
        IOException,SQLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException
